review: Dr. Sadhna Sha is an excellent Doctor. She is friendly & well-behaved. She patiently listen to your problem & explain everything you want to know. I am satisfied with her treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My nine month baby was suffering with severe wheezing. We had taken her to emergency and the doctor on duty without examining properly said we needed to get ger admitted into ICU. We understood it was not a situation which warranted  ICU admission and decided to contact our family paediatrician the next morning. However the next morning our family paediatrician said she would not be able to see before the evening. It was then we googled and came across Dr Sha. One call and she immediately gave us an appointment for the morning. And helped us in getting admission to a normal ward in a hospital. Took good care of her for the next 3 days and came 2 times a day to check on her health.  It is said that doctors is another form of God and she is an very apt example for the same.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I first visited her when my child was 14months and he was having cough and cold. Her medicine worked on my baby. This was for the first time that my baby recovered without antibiotics otherwise we always had to give him antibiotics for cough and cold. This was very frequent since my baby was 7 months old and I was used to giving antibiotics which was at the same time very painful for me. This got my faith on her after that. Next when my baby was 17 months he again got cough and cold and we continued the same medicine for 4 days but  his condition did not improve so we visited Dr Sadhna again. She told us to stop the medicine and let him recover on his own as his chest was clear. I was surprised to see that it worked. For the first time my baby recovered on his own from cough and cold. Last time we visited her for vaccination. It was also not very painful for my baby. A few more good things about her is that you don't have to wait with your baby for very long as she plans visit timing with accuracy. The sitting area has enough space for your baby to play. She also gives sufficient time to explain the details and monitor baby. Her clinic is v cosy and child friendly.Dr is v caring,impeccable with  v good communication and  I  strongly recommend Dr Sadhna ** *** ** *** ****** ***** * **** *** ** ****

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr. Sadhna Sha twice for my 4.5-month-old son's vaccinations, and things seemed okay. However, when I visited her on October 27th due to my son's cough and some eye irritation, she seemed distracted *** ****** ******** ******* ** ****** She checked my son and said he is fine. I insisted that he was coughing frequently, I belive he has cough. But she said no. ** ******* ***** ** ***** ****** ********* ***** ***** ** ******* *** ******** ****** **** ****** ********** ********* *** **** ********* *** ********* ****. During our visit, I informed her that we'd be returning to our place and would give the December vaccination there. This seemed to upset her. She kept asking, "Will you come again?" and her attention wavered while writing the prescription. ** **** **** *** *** **** ********* ***** ****** ** ** ******** **** ** ***** *******Later, when I contacted her on WhatsApp about my son's ********* condition at 5.30 pm on the 29th, she read the message but hadn't responded by 10.30 pm. This is concerning because when I first arrived in Kolkata and was searching for a pediatrician, she replied promptly. ** **** ** **** **** *** *** ***** *** *** ******** *** **** ********* **** **** **** ************ ********** ******* ************ *** **** ****** ** ****** ** **** *** ***** ******* ************* ******* ******* **** * ****** ********* ********** **** * ************* ** ******** ** ******* *** ********** ****** ** ***** * ****** ****** ********** ******* ******* **** ****** ********* I hope others will consider this feedback when choosing a pediatrician. Always prioritize those who genuinely care for their patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My two year old was suffering from fever, vomiting and cough and cold, and Dr Sha was able to diagnose the issue at hand and provide the necessary treatment quickly. My daughterâ€™s condition improved steadily in the next few days following our consultation. Doctor was very friendly and informed us at length about the treatment. We were very happy with our visit and highly recommend her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She administered general cough medicine first. After 5 days though the fever and running nose were gone, cough was still there. She suggested very mild antibiotic and my baby got better in 2 days. She listened to our problems patiently and very gentle in her approach.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I strongly believe that the way a doctor treats/behaves with his /her patient is one of the most important factor to consider when you are choosing a doctor. Ma'am is extremely polite, and makes you feel very comfortable. Even after the visit she keeps in touch over what's ap (if required). This quality is almost absent in today's time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Her behaviour  was not friendly. *** ***** ****  *********  **** * ******* *** * ************  ** * ******* * ***** **** *** *** ** *******  ** * *******  ** we are paying for  a treatment  not consulting for free. She might  b  a very good paed but  her approach  and mannerisms  are not frndly with a mother  *** *** ** ********** ** ******** * ******* ****** She wasn't co- operative at all    .  I will  never consult her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Highly impatient doctor. She didnâ€™t listen to my issues properly. I consulted her online for my babyâ€™s high fever and I was really worried as she was having fever from 5 days. I was really hoping some help and assurance but I didnâ€™t feel that I was heard properly. Would never recommend and consult again.
reply_text:
It is always my endeavour to keep my patients happy. According to my records you had booked an appointment for 9.45am amd though I tried to contact you from 9.40am you only responded at 9.55am. This was followed by a few audio calls then video consultation and the consultation was completed after 10.45am. I think after such a long consultation of over an hour, it is unfortunate you feel I did not hear you properly.
At the time you appeared quite satisfied and even thanked me for promptly seeing all the reports I had asked for.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Sha is vastly experienced in paediatric care and attached to renowned Institutions. Her clinical diagnosis, choice of minimum medicines and very kind attitude towards patient as well as to family members are something we miss in today's world. 

Medicines alongwith healing through reassurance to the small children is a candid approach. Doctor is extremely professional and every step towards prognosis is measured and well balanced. She always responds to phone calls and messages through WhatsApp.

I will recommend everybody in case they need any medical care for their child.

reply_text: It is always my greatest endeavour to keep all my patients and caregivers happy. Unfortunately during these covid times it can be very difficult to answer all queries with N95mask faceshield etc and I have encouraged all my patients to consult me same day with video call at no extra charge with their queries

reply_text:
I am sorry to disappoint you. It is always my endeavour to keep all my patients and their caregivers happy.
Unfortunately as you have mentioned in the consultation you have shown more then ten doctors and are unhappy with all of them. I wish you luck.
